title: Cloud Giant
contents: subtitle | Huge giant, neutral good (50%) or neutral evil (50%)
property | Saving Throws | Con +9, Wis +7, Cha +7
description | Keen Smell | The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
description | Innate Spellcasting | The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
description | At will | detect magic, fog cloud, light
description | 3/day each | feather fall,jly, misty step, telekinesis
description | 1/day each | control weather, gaseous form
description | Multiattack | The giant makes two morningstar attacks.
description | Morningstar | Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.
description | Rock | Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target . Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

description | Fling | The giant tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet ofit. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of the giant's choice and land prone, taking 1d8 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

description | Wind Aura | A magical aura of wind surrounds the giant. The aura is a 10-foot-radius sphere that lasts as long as the giant maintains concentration on it (as if concentrating on a spell). While the aura is in effect, the giant gains a +2 bonus to its AC against ranged weapon attacks, and all open flames within the aura are extinguished unless they are magical.
